"Just Attack":
"Just Attack guarantees a critical hit and inflicts
heavy damage.
The enemy is also greatly staggered by the attack."

"Just Attack
Just Attack is triggered when you press the
attack button just as the red glowing ring
around your character disappears after attacking."

"You can also use Just Attack in combination
with photon arts or charged techniques."
